title: Editors Choice Pictures
text:
Pictures | Fri Feb 23, 2018 | 8:20am EST Editors Choice Pictures 
A woman villager cleans garbage in front of her house as flood hits Tanjungsari village in Tasikmalaya, Indonesia. Antara Foto/Adeng Bustomi/ via REUTERS Reuters / Friday, February 23, 2018 A woman villager cleans garbage in front of her house as flood hits Tanjungsari village in Tasikmalaya, Indonesia. Antara Foto/Adeng Bustomi/ via REUTERS Close 1 / 23 
Kelsey Serwa of Canada, Brittany Phelan of Canada, Sanna Luedi of Switzerland and Alizee Baron of France compete in the freestyle ski cross finals.   22, 2018 Kelsey Serwa of Canada, Brittany Phelan of Canada, Sanna Luedi of Switzerland and Alizee Baron of France compete in the freestyle ski cross finals. Gigi Graham (L), daughter of evangelist Billy Graham, is comforted by Michelle Bachelor, an employee at the Billy Graham Training Center, inside Chatlos Memorial Chapel, where a memorial for her father, who died Wednesday, took place in Asheville,... more Reuters / Thursday, February 22, 2018 Gigi Graham (L), daughter of evangelist Billy Graham, is comforted by Michelle Bachelor, an employee at the Billy Graham Training Center, inside Chatlos Memorial Chapel, where a memorial for her father, who died Wednesday, took place in Asheville, North Carolina. India Sherret of Canada crashes in the freestyle ski cross finals. REUTERS/Dylan Martinez Reuters / Thursday, February 22, 2018 India Sherret of Canada crashes in the freestyle ski cross finals. REUTERS/Dylan Martinez Close 12 / 23 
Roads and Transport Authority (RTA) unveil the design model of the hyperloop in Dubai. Hyperloop technology uses an electromagnetic propulsion system to accelerate the movement of goods and services through a vacuum tube. The system is designed to... more Reuters / Thursday, February 22, 2018 Roads and Transport Authority (RTA) unveil the design model of the hyperloop in Dubai. Hyperloop technology uses an electromagnetic propulsion system to accelerate the movement of goods and services through a vacuum tube. The system is designed to assist the levitation of the capsule slightly off the track within the tube and move it at speed up to 1200 km/hour. Accordingly, the hyperloop could travel between Dubai and Abu Dhabi in 12 minutes (about 90 minutes in a car), and lift about 10,000 passengers per hour in both directions. REUTERS/Christopher Pike Close 
Tae-Yun Kim of South Korea reacts after the 1000m speed skating heat.   23, 2018 Tae-Yun Kim of South Korea reacts after the 1000m speed skating heat. REUTERS/Damir Sagolj Close 14 / 23
